data.quote: The way I see it, every life is a pile of good things and bad things. The good things don’t always soften the bad things, but vice versa, the bad things don’t always spoil the good things and make them unimportant.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: You don’t just give up. You don’t just let things happen. You make a stand! You say no! You have the guts to do what’s right, even when everyone else just runs away.
data.author: Rose Tyler

data.quote: Some people live more in twenty years than others do in eighty. It’s not the time that matters, it’s the person.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: We’re all stories, in the end. Just make it a good one, eh?
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: Letting it get to you. You know what that’s called? Being alive. Best thing there is. Being alive right now is all that counts.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: This is who I am, right here, right now, all right? All that counts is here and now, and this is me
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: There’s always something to look at if you open your eyes!
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: Courage isn’t just a matter of not being frightened, you know. It’s being afraid and doing what you have to do anyway.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: The least important things, sometimes, my dear boy, lead to the greatest discoveries.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: A straight line may be the shortest distance between two points, but it is by no means the most interesting.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: Never give up. Never give in.
data.author: The War Doctor

data.quote: We’re all capable of the most incredible change. We can evolve while still staying true to who we are. We can honour who we’ve been and choose who we want to be next.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: There's no point in being grown up if you can't be childish sometimes.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: Never run when you're scared.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: One good solid hope's worth a cart-load of certainties.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: To the rational mind, nothing is inexplicable; only unexplained.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: Always search for the truth. My truth is in the stars and yours is here.
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: Homo sapiens. What an inventive, invincible species. It’s only a few million years since they crawled up out of the mud and learned to walk. Puny, defenseless bipeds. They’ve survived flood, famine and plague. They’ve survived cosmic wars and holocausts. And now, here they are, out among the stars, waiting to begin a new life. Ready to outsit eternity. They’re indomitable. Indomitable
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: For some people, small, beautiful events are what life is all about!
data.author: The Doctor

data.quote: I do what I do because it’s right! Because it’s decent! And above all, it’s kind! It’s just that. Just kind. If I run away today, good people will die. If I stand and fight, some of them might live – maybe not many, maybe not for long. Hey, maybe there’s no point in any of this at all, but it’s the best I can do. So I’m going to do it, and I will stand here doing it until it kills me
data.author: The Doctor
